name: @sui-venture/ts-utils
description: Sui blockchain utilities for Sui Venture (powered by EasySui)

scripts.deploy_localnet: sui client switch --env localnet && cross-env NETWORK=localnet tsx src/scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy_devnet: sui client switch --env devnet && cross-env NETWORK=devnet tsx src/scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy_testnet: sui client switch --env testnet && cross-env NETWORK=testnet tsx src/scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy_mainnet: sui client switch --env mainnet && cross-env NETWORK=mainnet tsx src/scripts/deploy.ts
